nodes.text: Ellis Ruger was a male Human marshal who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. Stationed on Belsavis, he was killed by an Imperial that was sent to end his activities against the Empire.

Ellis is a NPC character in the Star Wars: The Old Republic. His fate can be decided two ways: Execute him before a hologram of Warden Graal (dark side option) or ransom him and demand he be relieved of duty, to which Graal complies (light side option).
